text: Josh & the crew at Bradford are awesome.  they helped me find a place to live when I was down and out and took care of me the entire time I lived there.  they go above and beyond for anyone who walks through their front door.  they're also very supportive in the community and I like to support those who give back.  thumbs up for Bradford realty.

name: Sasha Jiminez
text: rented from this co for 6 years while I lived in Montevallo.  great to work with.  never had any major maintenance problems that they didn't take care of right away.  always kind and friendly and glad to help in whatever way possible.  lots of my friends rented from them as well.  would highly recommend.

name: Bowbee Outdoors
text: Josh is disrespectful to customers. Maitnance is nonexistent. If ac goes out expect 3 days minimum before anyone even looks. Flood in your ground level apt? Not there problem for at least a week. Plenty of other options. I rather blowtorch my nipples off than deal with this company again.

name: Bethany Aucoin
text: I have been renting an apartment from Bradford for almost a year now and I have absolutely no complaints. I have noticed other people complaining about their discrimination or problems, but as a lesbian couple in the south, we have had nothing but pleasant conversations with the employees and they have always been happy to help us with whatever we may need. Our house could have been in better shape when we moved in, but the few issues that we have had have been taken care of by the employees promptly. They are all very nice people and I always have the best conversations with the lady at the front desk.

name: Sal Vagal
text: FANTASTIC Rental agency! I wish I could pick them up and take them with me.  They've been nothing but an absolute pleasure to work with.  I've read negative reviews but completely believe what you put in is what you get out.  I never had an issue that wasn't promptly corrected, never called and had anyone be rude to me.  They were always a pleasure.  I feel like in this world people think they can be rude and ugly to people in the service industry and expect them not to be rude back.....

name: Larry David
text: These folks were a pleasure to work with. I’d recommend them highly. Great to work with. Always going above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of and happy

name: Brooke Morgan
text: Do not trust this company. The house we rented from them was destroyed when we moved in—so my parents and I had to fix it up all on our own: repairs in the walls, the floors, the fixtures. It’s ridiculous. Not to mention, many people at Bradford are extremely rude and make my roommates and I feel inferior for even asking a question. Do NOT come to Bradford Real Estate. Find someone else who is worth your time, money, and cares about you genuinely as customers.

name: Penelope Wallace
text: I'd give them 10 Stars! They're all amazing to work with, Jeannie is super friend and Josh has always been on point.  They've been nothing but helpful and accommodating in everyway.  I wish all rental managers were this awesome! Thanks for making Montevallo an awesome place!

name: Tonya Young
text: Awesome folks! I don't know why anyone would ever complain about them!  They're timely and courteous and are always awesome to work with.

name: Apricot Pearson
text: Great folks- would highly recommend working with them.  They represent lots of good properties.

name: Jackson Pearson
text: I could not possibly agree more with the negative comments that I've read on here. I've lived in three of Bradford's properties over the last 10 years and have only positive things to say about them.  They're open Monday-Friday 9-5, just like their website says they are.  I will say that I've called within those hours and had to leave a message before but they've always called me back.  They have an email address for emergency maintenance which they've always been responsive to as far as I am concerned at least.  The people who work there are always polite and helpful.  I've had issues with bugs in the past as well but they sent an exterminator over for an extra spray a couple of times between the regular monthly spray and the issue was taken care of.  The guys who do their maintenance seem very nice.  They've surely never been rude or disrespectful.  I've had a couple of situations where they came to fix something and didn't have all of the parts the needed, so they had to leave and come back- once even hey had to order a part and it didn't come until the next day, but they seem to be qualified and have always made repairs that meet my standards.   I've surely never been made to feel as if they don't care about me or my issues.  I see them at least once per month to pay rents. I always have a delightful conversation with Jenny who works the front desk.  She is always kind to ask about my family and my life.  This business is very community oriented and involved in most every event that goes on in Montevallo.  I always see that they've sponsored little league and parades and festival and food drives.  I just can't imagine anything than that the people who have left negative comments created negative situations for themselves.  I'd even go so far as to say that this company goes above and beyond for their tenants.  Josh even came by to check on my heater one year on thanksgiving night because it had been giving me some issues that week.  anyone that is going to come out after hours and on a holiday just to make sure my family and I aren't cold is ok by me.  I'd give these people 10 stars if it was an option.

name: Christie Albergine
text: I️ had a great e patience with these people. I️ have to imagine for those that didn’t that it was their own fault.

name: Reckless Love
text: Applied for a rental house with a co-signer that was within my price range, paid the application fee, only for them to waste 3 day of my time after being told my the agent that there should be no problem getting approved. I constantly felt an air of discrimination from the front desk secretary. multiple times I was refused to speak with my agent. I was quoted a timeframe of 12 hours, it has been 3 days and they refuse to work with me. This company has lied to me, wasted my time, and now put me at a severe disadvantage with less than 24 hours to find a place to go. Gina is overall unpleasant to work with and Josh refuses to speak with clients. The power of approval is in a single mans hands (josh). there is no regulated system, but seemingly approving or denying basred of opinions of the person. the entire time I felt I was being pushed away and like they were trying to keep me out. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHOULD YOU GIVE THIS COMPANY YOUR BUSINESS.

name: Ouida Brackett
text: I called to deal with an issue of the company putting a check through on my account that was post dated. When I initially asked the front desk clerk if it would be okay to pay my 1st months rent,  and since I was there, give her a check for the upcoming months rent. I don't live in Montevallo and the property I was renting was in Alabaster. So since you can't pay rent online, I gave the post dated check so that I wouldn't have to drive back to Montevallo. I was assured TWICE by the clerk that this was okay. Fast forward after I paid my initial deposit as well as first month's rent. They decided to also deposit my post dated check for the upcoming month. Leaving me with an NSF due to the fact that the postdated amount wasn't accounted for in my monthly budget. ESPECIALLY after you already received $2,000 from me within a weeks time. I called and spoke with JOSH who verbally assaulted me and basically called me a criminal for writing bad checks. After he informed me that it's not their policy to take a post dated check and he doesn't know where I got that info from. I LITERALLY GOT IT FROM THE FRONT DESK  CLERK!!!! HE took no ownership, did not apologize, complained about a $50 fee he would have to pay b/c of my returned check and then hung up in my face. The crazy thing about this whole situation is that the check cleared on my end. My bank LITERALLY cleared the check and just charged me an NSF fee. All I wanted was my $30 back. He didn't even have the human decency to listen to what I was telling him before becoming beligerent!! This company is the absolute worst that I have ever dealt with in my life. And my husband is military so we have moved and dealt with numerous companies. RUN...DON'T WALK AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!!!!

name: Jansen Arceneaux
text: If you enjoy rental companies without an after hours line, customer service agents that will lie to you about appointments and then call you the liar when confronted than this is the place for you! Worst rental experience I've had in a long time. This is a small town, small family, small minded company. They truely don't care about you. From a customer service standpoint I was so dissapointed. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere. Also they do not do electronic payments!!! This is the 21st century Bradford!! Try and keep up 😉

text: The people working there are the absolute nicest and the condo was spectacular!!! Love this rental company and will definitely be using them in the future! Highly recommend!!

name: Lewis Golden
text:
I just got off the phone with the owner of the company and these people are TERRIBLE to deal with!  First they double-booked me, then set aside a unit that wasn't comparable.  What adult couple wants to sleep in twin beds?  They kept promising a better unit might open up and when it didn't, we were inside of 30 days.  As any consumer would, I made other arrangements.  They made the initial mistake and never offered any concessions in an attempt to correct it.  The real kicker is that they kept a portion of my deposit for "processing".  BUYER BEWARE - definitely will not be doing with this company EVER!

Updated:  I didn't just "inquire" about a unit, you sent me a rental confirmation.  We were on board, but that was before you back-tracked on verbal commitments you made regarding parking passes and check-out time, which resulted in a different total amount due.  We even spoke regarding the refund, at which time you agreed to refund the full amount.  There was a clear pattern of miscommunication and failure to follow through with commitments and we made the decision to make other plans for fear of the pattern effecting our vacation in a more significant manner.  You yourself even admitted that you booked the original before knowing that it was available.  Look, problems do happen.  The difference can be seen in how you respond.  In my opinion, your response was less than satisfactory and I feel the need to make sure others know in advance who they are dealing with.

name: Suzanne Johnson
text: Amazing July 4th! Condo was great as suggested by the knowledgable and helpful staff. We will definitely use 3 Palms for our future vacations. Thanks!

They have been easy to work with and met all committments they have promised.  When our preferred unit was not available they have worked hard to find us a suitable alternate.  We are going down for October 2014 and looking forward to it.  I believe this will be the fourth year in a row they have helped us with a unit at Four Seasons which we like very much.

name: Leah Middlebrook
text: RentMonster, and Jessi in particular, was an incredible help for my remote search for a new apartment in Birmingham! She was very responsive and went out of her way to make sure I had all of the information I might need. She was very thoughtful and made the dreaded apartment search easy and fun. 10/10 would use RentMonster again and recommend them to anyone looking to rent in Birmingham!

resp.text: Thanks, Leah!

name: Meagan Belflower
text: I had a hard time finding an apartment after a bad landlord experience, and was tired of trying to sift through reviews, prices and locations. While searching I saw an ad for RentMonster and thought I'd give it a shot. After typing in my information, Jessi called me the same day and set up an appointment with me THAT afternoon. RentMonster did not charge any fees, and Jessi was super helpful and drove me around Birmingham looking at different places. RentMonster will NOT work with slumlord landlords and has even "fired" rental companies that do not match certain standards. Couldn't be happier with the location of my apartment and the company that runs the property. Thanks RentMonster!

name: Anh PT Do
text: Sherwin was very professional and helpful during the difficult process of moving to Alabama from far away. He made my move easier. definitely recommend their service to anyone

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Anh! We hope you enjoy your new home and love living in Birmingham!

name: Art Hill
text:
I recommend Rent Monster for anybody who’s getting their first apartment or anyone who wants another apartment quickly. I submitted my info online and then I got a text the next day.

Ashlyn was my leasing agent and she was AWESOME. She showed me around to places within my budget and gave me all the details about the application process with them. She was super accommodating for my schedule and she sent me pictures and videos of potential places to help me decide on what I want. She was super professional and very casual. I felt like one of my friends was helping me find my very first apartment. I hope she gets a promotion really quickly because she deserves it.

resp.text: Thanks, Art! We will make sure Ashlynn sees your kind words. :-)

name: lauren ray
text: I sought out assistance with finding an apartment last May and Caleb Clark was my lovely representative who helped me in every way possible. The process was smooth and I ended up finding a wonderful one bedroom apartment within my price range and location that I asked for. Caleb was extremely polite and informative with every question I had and with details of each location we looked at. I always recommend them to my friends when they begin looking for somewhere new to move. If you’re looking to move contact RentMonster and ask for Caleb, you won’t be disappointed!

resp.text: Thanks for this very thoughtful review, Lauren! We will be sure Caleb sees it!

name: Michael Lindsey
text: Caleb came through for us in a huge way. We had a few days really to get set up, so things were tight. We met at the office, went on a walk and got to know each other. He was kind, generous, and good humored. He asked good questions to get to know us and what we were interested in, and we were signing documents within hours, if I recall. It was clear he wanted us to find the best place for our needs. He stayed in the mix with us as we transitioned into the property owner system to make sure everything went well. This experience for us couldn't have gone better. A godsend.

resp.text: Thanks, Micheal! We're so glad you had such a wonderful experience. Please stay in touch!

name: Molly Sharit
text: This service should not be free!!! I had such a wonderful experience with Caleb, he helped me find a wonderful apartment in less than a week! He listened to all of my concerns about my wants and NEEDS in a place, as well as price range, before setting up multiple tours for me and I was able to sign my lease that same day! I could not recommend this service more!!!

resp.text: "Should not be free", you say... hmmm... maybe... Nah, just kidding! RentMonster will always offer our service for free! We couldn't be more grateful for your kind words. Thanks, Molly!

name: Kathleen Dexter
text: If you need a place to live and you need it fast, no hold-ups, no waiting periods, and zero fuss with multiple leasing offices, do yourself a HUGE favor and contact Caleb at RentMonster. He’ll get your parameters in a brief survey interview, run your qualifying numbers, and have a list of places ready in less than 14 days. My roommate and I were guided through SIX different apartments within the few downtown communities we loved most. We said Yes To The Glen Iris Apartment and we’re moved in within one more week! Thanks Caleb, for making us feel like we picked out our first home. We got everything we wanted!

resp.text: What a magnificent review! Thanks for your faith in us, Kathleen. We'll be sure Caleb sees your glowing words!

name: Odion Ovbiagele
text: I was assigned to Mary Alice and she responded to me less than 24 hours after I completed the form on their website. She asked me for all of my preferences, and sent me a list of apartments to consider on the following work day. My roommate and I were able to find a place and sign a lease in just three days! Mary Alice was a delight to work with and made sure to specify important details in the leasing process, something that many other agents/property managers have not done for me in the past. I highly recommend using Rentmonster, especially for people who need to find housing ASAP! Ask for Mary Alice!

resp.text: Thanks so much for these kind words, Odion!

name: Darrian Bryant
text: I recently started grad school at UAB & I used rent monster to help me find the perfect apartment. Ashlynn Phelps made the process smooth and easy, and she got to the root of every issue I thought I had. This is a GREAT tool for people who have never lived in Birmingham, looking to rent an apartment. All the places she showed me were super nice & I was able to pick my best choice among a handful of great choices. I love my new place. Ask for Ashlynn!

resp.text: Thanks so much for these kind words, Darrian!

name: Ashley Davis
text: After sifting through various online listings and touring several apartments, a friend suggested that I try rent monster. Robin was excellent! She quickly replied to my inquiry and within a week we had scheduled to look at 5 different apartments. Each apartment met all of my needs and wants! I would use rent monster again and will definitely encourage friends to use them/Robin as well!

resp.text: Thanks, Ashley! We're grateful for the opportunity to help. :-)

name: Aditya Vikram
text: I had the good fortune to come across Rentmonster on a subreddit and make the acquaintance of Caleb who was friendly, delightful and resourceful. He helped us find a place that was the perfect fit within the span of an afternoon. When the first few listings that had been picked out online before driving down to Birmingham didn't meet our expectations, he immediately showed us a couple of other listings which we absolutely loved. I could never have found such a conveniently located and ideal apartment without the extra attention and effort that Caleb put in. We were pleasantly surprised to later learn that Caleb was going to be our neighbour in the same building and have gotten to know him better since. If you haven't found your apartment to rent, look no further. Caleb and Rentmonster have your back!

resp.text: Thanks a million for the wonderful review, Aditya! We hope you continue to enjoy your sweet new home!

Rent monster was such a blessing for me these past months. It was so easy to get an appointment with Robin and she was more than happy to show us an array of apartments that matched my taste! She was also extremely helpful with assisting me on getting prepared for my lease, and anything else I needed. I don’t know if i could have found a place this easy and that matched my style so fast! Please use rent monster, you will not be disappointed i promise!

Thank you again so much Robin 💗

name: Shalette Anderson
text: They didn’t have anything for me which is fine. I didn’t fall into their criteria but the communication was not good they reached out Monday. I responded and they ignored me and reached back out Wednesday and apologized, tried again and ghosted me when I had a follow up questions which sucks because I qualified for the final place they sent me. But the properties they work with would prob not be too happy with lack of communication, maybe they need more people on their staff.

resp.text: I think we may have different perspectives on your experience. Our text and phone records do not match up with what you describe. We would love to communicate with you and see if we can figure out where the confusion is. Please feel free to call the office.

name: Colton Windsor
text:
After struggling to find a place in Birmingham in my budget and in the area I was looking for, a family member suggested I try rentmonster. I filled out a short form on the site detailing specifics about my search, and I received a text message response from Ashlynn within a few hours - and this was on a Saturday no less.

Ashlynn was great - she found multiple places that fit all of my specifications before the coming Monday and set up remote tours that we conducted over FaceTime. No option felt like a waste of time and Ashlynn had answers to almost every question I had about every place. Anything that she didn’t have info for on hand she found the answers and got back to me almost immediately.

After I made my choice, Ashlynn assisted in the application process - which went more smoothly and quickly than any I have experienced. Instead of having to leave voicemails with property managers or trade emails back and forth I had a single point of contact that I could reach out to over text and got responses within minutes.

Even after moving in, Ashlynn has reached out to make sure everything was satisfactory and continues to answer any random question I may have about the apartment.

This is a great service, and Ashlynn was a great rep!

resp.text: Thanks a million for this fantastic and detailed review! We're super happy that Ashlynn was able to make your apartment search such a smooth experience. :-)

name: Kevin Wright
text: Had a great experience with Jessi. She was very helpful and got me in a place within 2 days! Highly recommend this service.

resp.text: Thanks so much for these kind words, Kevin!

name: Jordan Fincher
text: Sarah truly went above and beyond to make sure my daughter and I found the perfect apartment. She was so quick to respond to my questions (and believe me, I had A LOT!) and made the process go by smoothly. She was such a reassuring presence the whole time, I'm not sure what I would have done if I had tried to do this alone. I couldn't have asked for a better apartment finding experience. If/when I decide to move, I know who I'm calling!

resp.text: We're so glad everything went smoothly for you and your daughter, Jordan. Thanks for the opportunity to serve and for your kind words! :-)

And Sarah hit it out of the park!!!!! Absolute perfect location to our jobs and exceptionally luxurious. And the best part is the service was absolutely free to us. Would 100 percent recommend this company and their Rockstar agent Sarah!!!!

I would 100% recommend using RentMonster to anyone considering moving to Birmingham!

text:
Sarah helped me find the perfect place that matched my budget, and also took into account my small child (we're very near an awesome park and on the bottom floor of our new building because he loves to run and stomp and I didn't want to be "that guy upstairs with the kid"). She was never pushy about getting me into a place I wasn't interested in. In fact, parking was so bad at one place that she apologized for even taking us there to begin with.

Moving is such a daunting task, and it was made SO much easier with Sarah's help. I LOVE my new place and I probably would never have found it if it hadn't been for Sarah and RentMonster.

I can't thank you enough, Sarah!

name: Chloe Whitaker
text: Sarah was so great in helping me find my first apartment. I gave her some confusing wants/needs because I wasn't exactly sure what I was looking for. She seemed to read my mind and found the perfect two bedroom apartment within my budget. She also went above and beyond to make sure that the apartment was repainted and cleaned properly before I moved in. She made the apartment search, application process, and lease signing so much easier by getting me directly in contact with the right people. I will be using Rent Monster again!

name: Jacynda Woodman-Ross
text: I am completely blown away by how easy and pleasant RentMonster made finding an apartment. I worked with Sarah and she made the whole process super simple and quick. I liked that she really understood what aspects of an apartment would be important to me and worked to find several options within my budget. Something I wasn't expecting (but deeply appreciated!) was that during our consultation meeting and when touring apartments, Sarah always asked me deeper questions about how felt about certain apartments, what features of an apartment would be most important to me, etc. It got me considering things that I hadn't even thought of before. That attention to detail and care was so wonderful. I can tell that she really had my best interest at heart during the whole process.

resp.text: We are so happy you loved our services and left a review! We always try to personalize each client's appointment and find them a place that they'll LOVE.

text: Mary Alice did a wonderful job making sure I found me new home in Birmingham, we look at 4 places all in one trip and I got a really good deal for the city. I love my new home and definitely will be telling everyone I meet who is looking to rent to use rent Monster.

text: My boyfriend and I were very skeptical at first. Having never been exposed to apartment finder services, Rent Monster seemed too good to be true! He was patient and kind and fun and helpful, and because of him we are now living in a wonderful apartment in our ideal location. We HIGHLY recommend Rent Monster. These folks are great.

text: Melissa was the best! She was so helpful and sweet! I would recommend her to anyone trying to find an apartment in the downtown Birmingham area. She had me moved into my new place in no time! Thanks Melissa! :)

text:

She didn't force me towards a particular unit but was absolutely honest in answering my questions so I could make the most informed decision. She was there every step of the way and made herself available to answer questions, ask questions to the property manager on my behalf and even has followed up to see how I like my new place! I highly recommend her and RentMonster. If I move again, I will, without a doubt, be contacting Jessi again!!!

name: Katelyn Connell
text: I cannot say enough great things about Rent Monster. I worked with Melissa, and she went out of her way time and again to make sure I got the right place. She even came by to unlock the door for the utility companies when I couldn't meet them in time. Even after I had settled into my new place, Melissa kept in contact and introduced me to other people in my neighborhood. Rent Monster offers so much more than just rental assistance. And it's FREE. If you are renting in Birmingham, do yourself a favor and let Rent Monster be your guide.

name: Jessie Tidwell
text: Zachary and his team are beyond helpful. Multiple times they have helped me track down the perfect place for me and my dog. Go see them FIRST!   😀 😀 😀

name: Sarah Hall
text:
My second time using Rentmonster and it was awesome both times! Jessi toured me both times and listened to what a wanted, gave me background information on all the places we toured, and didn’t push me to make a decision or like any specific place.
I love Rentmonster!! Go here if you need to find a place!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! You rock!

name: Ashley McCormick
text: Melissa was so helpful! She worked really hard to help me find the perfect apartment for me and my dog. She walked with me through the application process and made sure I understood what I was to provide with the application. She was able to answer all of my questions. We are so happy in our new home. Thanks, Melissa!

Save yourself the hours of Craigslist search and just call these guys!

text: Jessie Tidwell is the best! She is extremely knowledgeable about the Birmingham area and is able to match clients needs to the perfect apartment. Highly recommend.

text: This past April my bestfriend and I were looking for the perfefct apartment for two, I asked a friend and she referred me to Rent Monster. Mary Alice made everything super easy and we were moved into our apartment in no time.

name: Price Mason
text: Rent Monster helped me find the apartment of my dreams. They worked very hard to find me just what I was looking for. I recommend them 100%. Thank you guys!

name: G Hay
text: Rentmonster is a fantastic company! Zach helped us search for apartments on two separate occasions and did an incredible job of compiling a list of places that best matched our long wishlist. He is super knowledgeable about all the neighborhoods in town, too. We always recommend them to friends looking for a new place.

He was always highly responsive to my texts, emails and calls and also found me a unit that had not yet been listed.  Would recommend to anyone.

name: Michael Gray
text: I worked with Leah and she was fantastic. Very personable and worked incredibly hard to help me find the right place for me.

name: Andrew McCormick
text: Apartment shopping is a pleasant experience with Rent Monster. Agents are personable and experienced.

name: James Trommer
text: Rent Monster was awesome! I had to move to Birmingham all the way from Michigan and was not able to come visit beforehand so I was coming in very blind. Jessi Tidwell made it very easy and nowhere near as scary as it had to be because she took the time to get to know me a little bit, figure out what made sense for me, and coupled that with her knowledge of the renters market in Birmingham set me up with the perfect apartment. She took videos for me and as many pictures as I wanted and did not try to hide the flaws of potential apartments. Was very honest and helpful and made my scary cross country move, much easier. Also, its free! There is no reason not to use Rent Monster to help you find a place.

text: I'm such a fan of this crew! I'm especially appreciative of Melissa's patience...but it paid off!!! I am so excited about my new apartment in Avondale :) THANK YOU!!!!

text: So first thing first, finding the time to apt search is an extremely difficult and time consuming experience. my wife and i decided to utilize rent monster and had a great experience.Leah truly was a God send she went completely above and beyond to help find us something that we would be satisfied with. She would simply not take no for an answer when there was push back with certain companies and their strict credit requirements. Life happens and certain situations arise that are out of a persons control. Leah not only understood that but made it her personal mission to help resolve an issue we had been having with one particular company here in Birmingham. Kudos to her and the amazing staff at Rent monster for truly earning our business. Definitely appreciate it!!

name: Anna Waters
text: I love Rent Monster, I love my apartment, I love the price I pay for it, I love my neighborhood, I love the care package they sent me after I moved in, I love Melissa who helped me find this place. Can't recommend highly enough.

name: Kindle Rudolph
text: Outstanding service. They have access to apartments that are not listed anywhere on the internet.

name: Thomas Jones
text:
I had to make a spur of the moment move from Tuscaloosa to Birmingham after I got a job here and the commute was killing me. Rentmonster was an absolute life saver trying to find an apartment around town.

I was initially staying in an extended stay hotel trying to find a place, doing hours of research every night, and because of my work schedule I couldn't tour many places due to their limited office hours. I heard about Rentmonster and it just made sense. They have a ton of connections with apartments around town, a huge list of potential properties, and best of all: it was free. I had an all the benefits of an expensive broker without paying a dime.

My particular agent, Jessi, went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help me out. With my work schedule we couldn't do much during the week - she worked with my schedule and met me on a few Saturdays/Sundays when she normally wouldn't be working. Jessi was very easy going, professional, insanely knowledgeable about the properties and apartments in the area, and the whole staff made me feel at home from the moment I walked into their offices. Jessi worked with me over the course of a week or two, whittling down the places I did and didn't like, and eventually found  a place that I ABSOLUTELY love - which is surprising considering how picky I was. Throughout the whole process, Jessi was very patient working with me to find exactly what I wanted.

Kudos to Jessi, and the rest of the Rentmonster staff. Over the course of my apartment search I spent a fair amount of time in their offices, and they were all very welcoming and wonderful, one of the best customer service experiences I've ever had. I highly recommend Rentmonster if you're looking for an apartment and you're overwhelmed at the sheer number of other avenues and options offered from other apartment services.

name: Autumn Brown
text: LOVE the rent monsters!!! Friendly and great service!

name: Ginger Tunnell
text: They found the perfect home for me.

name: Sarah Barber
text: DO NOT RENT FROM THIS COMPANY. My husband and I were tenants with them for two years while we were in school in Montgomery, and the only reason we didn't move out sooner is because moving is a pain in the you know what. We paid our rent 6 months at a time and kept the house super clean, however whenever something needed to be fixed/repaired the landlord drug his feet. One example being that the dishwasher completely went out right after we moved in and it took ONE MONTH to get a new one. Another time, the heater went out and plumbing backed up in the same day, and when I hadn't heard anything from the repair man by that afternoon, I called to check and they FORGOT to call him!(Not to mention I was pregnant at the time.) Last straw.. we have since moved out and it has taken them OVER 30 days to return the security deposit to us. Save yourself some time and frustration, and DO NOT RENT FROM MONTGOMERY METRO REALTY.

name: Rosalind Lewis
text: Clerk at front desk, friendly and cooperative. When searching for apartment more one bedroom available than additional bedrooms apartments.

name: Hoshi Yoshi
text: This review is for the leasing office, not for my apartment. My apartment and its on-site Property Management as well as maintenance is wonderful. I've had a lot of things get broken in my apartment due to normal use and all have been fixed promptly. However the website is not a good choice when trying to get something fixed quickly. I don't think they actually check their messages from the website. You have a much better chance of getting something fixed if you call-in your maintenance request. The leasing office itself also seems a bit scattered and the staff can be curt and unhelpful. However, the rules all seem fair. I have not had any issues with them keeping their side of our leasing contract. I also think some of the shortcomings of the leasing office have to do what the small size of the staff and the large number of properties that they have to communicate with. Which is to say, that I don't think they are able to stay up-to-date on what is happening with all of the properties, so they're not the best people to go to for property issues. I think your experience with JH Berry depends mostly on who your property manager is.

name: Lee Robinson
text: Rejected me because I'm self-employed. I've rented places my whole adult life, I have excellent credit and rental history. My parents were kind enough to offer co-sign. They were rejected too b/c they are retired and their income, which is no small sum, is largely from social security. None of us have ever been rejected for anything like this before. Two stars for nice place and the staff was kind but the office policies are rigid and unreasonable. JH Berry you just lost out on a superior tenant.

name: Michael Reed
text: By far the worst rental company I have ever dealt with in my 30$ years of apartment living and my 1 star rating because you can't choose less is a  overrated choice. My true rating would be -5 stars but I was not given that option .

name: Carlye Poljacik
text: If I could give JH Berry 0 stars I would. I love my apartment, but no apartment in the world is worth dealing with this terrible leasing company. I truly think they go out and look for the rudest most in- compassionate people they can find to work for them. I have heard form other apartments than mine that there is always issues (my heat and air have stopped working a total of 5 times in a 6 month period). I get that Birmingham buildings are old, but their maintenance is so slow, communication is poor and they are all around extremely rude people who will do absolutely nothing to help you. i saw the bad reviews and ignored them. TRUST ME DON'T IGNORE THIS REVIEW.

name: Scout Moonflower
text: JH Berry has been prompt in fixing any problem I've had, they call you back asap and are friendly, I've never had pests in my apartment, and they helped with a neighbor of mine that didn't follow smoking rules. They have been the best rental company I've had experience with and I've been renting around Birmingham for 17 years.

Constantly had appliance issues because they would not add funds to fix old, broken equipment which they are supposed to provide. Threatened to take all my property 2 days before my lease expired.

Often times you have to keep calling b/c it wasn't fixed right the first time, but they consider that you breaking it b/c it was "Just fixed". Grrrrr

name: David Morrison
text:
I work as a General Contractor remodeling homes in the Birmingham, AL area.  We became part of the Main Street Renewal team over a year ago.  The partnership couldn’t be better.  In the last year and half we have remodeled close to 100 homes with close to 20 of which were Main Street Renewal properties.  Let me tell anyone looking for a rental property in the Birmingham area to make Main Street Renewal your first/last call.

I can say with first hand knowledge that the quality of the homes in Main Street’s portfolio is second to none.  The majority of property management companies seem to be more worried about profits rather than having the best homes in the city.  In fact, when my lease runs out at my current home I will be moving into a Main Street property myself.

Finally, let me say to any other contractor’s looking for steady work.... get yourself setup as an approved vendor with Main Street.   You won’t find a better construction team to work with.  My primary point of contact is Superintendent Chris Harris.  Chris is great partner that has years of experience.  He will do anything in his power to help you succeed.  Eric Grill is the Construction Manager for Birmingham.  He too has been great to work with.

resp.text: Hi David, thank you for the wonderful review of your work with our homes! Main Street Renewal provides exceptional homes for our residents with a strong attention to craftsmanship. We are working hard, along with vendors like yourself, creating the best possible experience for current and future residents. I'm pleased to hear that Chris and Eric have been such great partners for you. Our team is fortunate to have them. We look forward to continuing to work with you in the future! Thanks, Will - Brand Reputation Specialist

name: Jeff Brittain
text: We rented from them for 2 years, maintenance requests were slow to be fixed and most times we repaired things ourselves. We moved in May because they wanted almost $100 more bucks a month for the same place we had lived for 2 years. We cleaned and repaired that place from top to bottom, got a satisfactory on everything on the checkout list, except for some touch up paint needed on the backdoor that was actually there when we moved in. Out of a $1495 deposit, they returned $497, stating it had to be repainted, dog odor (which was supposed to be covered with the non-refundable pet deposit we paid), and various other ridiculous claims. They were supposed to have called us back last week, and we have yet to hear from them. They stated they had over 60 other claims filed, so that tells me they're nothing but crooks! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY!!!

resp.text: Hi Jeff,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I want to apologize that your experience with our Maintenance and Move-Out Teams did not meet your expectations. I'm happy to follow up with you regarding the return of your security deposit. Please feel free to contact us at wecare@msrenewal.com so that we can gather some additonal information. While we understand that your time with us has ended, we wish you the best with your future home search.  Thanks, Will - Brand Reputation Specialist

name: Kenzie Underly
text:
Update 2 weeks after last update: RUN! Don't rent from this agency. They have sent out 4 of their mainstreet techs to look at the dryer outlet, every single one says we need an electrician. They say they'll put an order in for one to come out and they never do. I call again and it's been the same process EVERYTIME. I even contacted the email below and he said he would put an order in after the last guy did the same thing. Yet again they scheduled it to the same tech that was here last time.

Deck finally got fixed after multiple calls and emails. They didn't even use the weather treated wood, good luck to the next few renters who will go through the same thing in the next 5 years.

IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR SANITY PLEASE GO ELSEWHERE. I've called their service center at least 30 times over a 4 to 5 month span, all regarding maintenance. Most of their call center people are clueless.

Update: It's been 4 months, deck still isn't replaced. I had nothing but issues regarding people coming out to the house to fix varies things. Some of the vendors are great, other barely ever will call you back. Our outlet for our dryer has been shorting out for 3 months now and nothing has been done about. I often have to call at least 3 times before anyone will come out to the house. I emailed the email provided below, about 2 weeks ago, haven't heard anything back. The mountain of issues with this house keeps growing and I honestly regret going with this company. I counted the other day and I've called their maintenance center over 25 times in 4 months!

I love the neighborhood and size of our new place, except our moving in experience has been unpleasant. My partner and haven't been in our place for a month and it's been problem after problem.

The place was suppose to be inspected before we moved in and considering the plumbing inspector arrived a couple days after we moved, it's apparent this didn't happen. He said there was work that needed to be done. Never heard anything after that, until I reported a leaking pipe a couple days ago (the inspector came out almost 2 weeks ago). The downstairs reeks of mildew and the garage also has a leak ( the ceiling tiles in the garage around the leak have mold so it's easy to see there's a leak).

The lawn hadn't been mowed in 3 months according to the neighbors and it appears to be true.

The deck is completely rotted and my fiance already fell through once. This problem has been addressed and can't completely blame them for it going unnoticed since it on the side of the house and not directly connected to the back door.

Then today tops it all, the gutters haven't been cleaned in forever so now the backdoor is flooding the back room because the gutter is emptying right in front of the door.

The application process and our agent that we dealt with was great, but it's obvious there was a lot left undone before we moved in.

resp.text: Hi Kenzie,Thank you for taking the time to update your review. I understand that you've been experiencing a number of maintenance concerns since entering your home. I just noticed the email that you had sent over, and I will continue to follow up with you there as I receive any new information. We appreciate your patience as we work towards a resolution.Thanks, Will - Resident Experience Specialist

name: Shannon Bibbs- Napier
text:
I initially saw a house in Midfield I was possibly interested in and set up an appointment to go and view it . I even took off half a day so that I can make this appointment as if you're late to the appointment you would be charged a late fee . I went to check out the home and waited almost 15 minutes for the lady to come . We viewed the home but she kept trying to tell me about another property , etc etc. Before we left she asked if I could follow her to another house that I may like better which was about 10min away. I didn't like the home at all but I remember the agent telling me that they had more homes in the Hueytown area . The agent quickly text me an application but I continued to look . After finding a house in Midfield on there website that wasn't ready for viewing yet my brother and I applied for the home bc it was nice from the photos and I had stopped by to check it out myself . Paid the $80 sent in all my information and was  contacted my Robert Bickerton who told me and my brother how he needed to fill in his portion of the application and uplod his documents. Well the  link he sent wasn't working and I tried to explain that to him and all he emailed me back "please see the email I sent earlier" I then had to call in and speak with someone else and explain and they reset the link for me .  I saw where my credit had been checked and I said ok maybe they are moving along with the application process . I get a email the next day stating that we had been denied but he couldn't give me a specific reason but did say" it 's probably your rental history and  Rentgrow will be in contact with you on a couple of days to tell you why you were denied  " I contacted my landlord whom I have been renting from for 10 years and asked her had they called bc she is expecting them to reach and she said no one ever called her for my rental history . I even emailed ROBERT back to ask him  what he meant about rental history so I can tell him no one ever checked mine in the first place. He never responded back nor said anything else that may help is else  to get  into that home or another home .

Long story short  I didn't appreciate the way that things were handled and I felt as though I paid $80 for them to run one thing and that was it .

I'm so glad that we found another home with another rental company and had proof that they did employment verification as well as rental history verification . We will be moving into that home at the end of the month .
So it you're on the search please consider other companies before giving them your money .

resp.text: Hi Shannon,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. Our applications are processed by a third-party service called RentGrow, and they fully check rental history and employment verification. I want to apologize that your experience did not go as planned. We wish you all the best in your new home,  and please feel free to contact us if you have any additonal questions or concerns.    Thanks, Will - Brand Reputation Specialist

name: Lukesha Nick-Goon
text:
I've recently signed a lease with this company.  The day of move in, I do my walk through that I was told to do prior to moving in any of my belongings, only to find that as I walked down the stairs into the basement, that the stairway was blocked by the airducks connected to the AC unit. Mind you it's a Saturday that I move in. Contacted the company on that following Tuesday, AC repairs are still not done as of today. I've put in numerous work orders for the same repair. A representative contacts me after each work order and assures me that once the bid is in someone will be out to repair.

It's mid April in Alabama, thermostat stat has read a temp of 76 or more. It's hot AF. I can't rest and I am feed up. Let me not pay rent and pay for repairs.. My belongings, will be put out on the streets.

After reading these reviews, I wish I had read them prior to going through this company. All I want is a working AC unit. May is a few weeks away. I have 11 more months to be here..😣

resp.text: Hello Lukesha, We understanding moving is already stressful and having additional issues is not the experience we want to provide and we apologize for that. We are working to escalate your concerns within our Resident Resolutions department to ensure you are taken care of moving forward with these repairs. Our agents are working to gather an update on your repairs and will be contacting your directly to provide the next steps. Regards, Whitney – Resident Resolutions Specialist

Please let us know if you have any questions along the way. Our Resident Care Team is here to help!  Thanks, Will - Brand Reputation Specialist

name: Sabrea Baylor
text: This company here my friend, does not deserve a good review .Nevertheless,  They have beautiful properties. I live in Birmingham, Al and there was a property I viewed through Rently ,  when I viewed the property, it was still open and had not been applied for . This past Sunday on 2/2/2020 I decided to apply for the property and pay my application fee. After Applying, I wake up Monday morning to call and check on the property I was told by the Homewood Al office I would receive a call back in 20 minutes, never heard anything back. I get up Tuesday morning 2/3/2019 to go and visit Msrenewal, and check on it one of the property managers introduced himself, got my info and told me that he would check on my application, he later returned 5 minutes later stating that I had needed a guarantee for the house( A Bs excuse) . I’ve been renting since I was 19 years old and I am now 25, never had a broken lease and I’ve also never had an eviction nor late payment, furthermore I’ve never had a problem getting approved for anything, especially when you make the income .This would be my second house. However, I got in my vehicle and decided to check their website and the home was no longer available. I am not a genius but it doesn’t take a rocket science to see that someone was able to apply and secure the home before me, that isn’t the problem. The problem is the excuse I was given and the fact that they left the house available for people to still apply for knowing that they already had potential candidates ready to secure the home , and also the fact that they basically took my hard earned money when simply they could have reached out to me, and explained the situation, and offered for me to apply for another property with the app fee money ! I know that I am not the only person who has dealt with this situation but I did want to post a review and give a heads up to others that are interested in this company . I will be reporting them to bbb & reporting further more on the issue.

resp.text: Hey Sabrea, thank you for leaving us feedback. I apologize for the inconvenience that this caused. We do allow multiple applicants to apply for a home, and we are working to provide applicants with insight as to how many people have applied for the same home. As you stated, you can transfer your application to any one of our properties within 30 days of applying. If you would like to discuss your application or the process as a whole further, please reach out to us at wecare@msrenewal.com. Thanks, Will - Brand Reputation Specialist

name: G G
text: Great experience. Always, try to take care of concerns and or reply in a timely manner. I recommend!!

resp.text: Genoa,  Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!  Thanks, Robyn - Brand Reputation Coordinator Thanks, Robyn - Brand Reputation Coordinator

text: They are so confused we get a letter from them saying we were conditionally approved but have to meet financial requirements so I’ve been trying to call to see if we needed to pay extra and guess what they have no idea what’s going on they barely answer the phone anyways idek why i bothered honestly we’ve already wasted ton of money applying for houses that’s gone the next day

name: Britney Rice J
text: Currently a tenant with mainstreet as well and every experience has been a pain. Currently it is 91 degrees in my home and I have two small children and myself am an asthmatic. I have put in many work orders for someone to come out and work on the AC unit explaining that there is something wrong with it (this year and last year) each time they say it’s just old or it’s just really hot. Well this time there is NO cold air blowing whatsoever and my family and I are suffering. I’m sure that we will be told the same thing again and it will take many days for someone to get out. I won’t be able to take another day in this heat. Thank God my children are school age and they can get relief. I’m not sure why it’s like pulling teeth to get issues resolved with this company.

resp.text: Hi Britney, I would like to look into this for you. Can you please email wecare@msrenewal.com with your Main Street Renewal address and best number to contact you? Thanks, Adam - Manager, Brand Reputation

name: G. Jean
text: I had the pleasure of speaking with Rebecca and was very pleased with our conversation.  Her helpful suggestions and kind words really lifted my spirit and although I was a stranger to her, she spoke with me as a friend.  Main Street Renewal has some of the most lovely rentals I have seen and if I ever decide to rent again I will definitely use these guys.

resp.text: Hello, Here at Main Street we are family and want our teams to extend that out to all of our residents. We are thrilled that Rebecca was able to assist you to the best of her abilities and beyond. Thank you so much for the review and we hope you have a wonderful rest of the week! Regards, Whitney – Resident Resolutions Specialist

text: Great staff. Work orders are honored. There is an open line of communication in any given situation. Convenient online resources available for multiple tent tasks.

text: Calling the office is like running on a hamster wheel. Don't waste your time, nobody ever picks up or returns your call. You'll have to drive to the office and hope that someone is working during the hours stated online.
